779370.name: Earth 2140 - Soundtrack
779370.description:
The Official Soundtrack of EARTH 2140 - the 15 atmospherically tracks will be a feast for your ears.

  • 01. EARTH Theme (05:45)
  • 02. Child of 2140 (04:48)
  • 03. The Hunt (04:29)
  • 04. Birds (05:11)
  • 05. Deep in the Bunker (04:08)
  • 06. Hurricane (04:11)
  • 07. Before the Battle (07:01)
  • 08. Black Tech (04:13)
  • 09. Total Control (04:15)
  • 10. Everywhere (03:57)
  • 11. Bubbles' Revenge (04:36)
  • 12. Big Journey (03:03)
  • 13. Hope (03:36)
  • 14. 2140 (03:28)
  • 15. Space (03:58)

and 9 Instrumental Mix Bonus Tracks.

Mastermix by Harold Faltermeyer for Red Deer Recording Studios
